That\'s... That\'s... That\'s crazy! ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)
\*wipes tear from eye\* I. Must. Have. This.
Well, my brain is now all over the room. Excellent work.
Thinking about it, these\'ll be great for exploration of other planets.
How did you get them to fold? ???
cfg edits to the DamnedRobotics pack

Autobots - move out!

This is seriously awesome though, well done.

Yes, but can you do it vanilla?

***CHALLENGE ACCEPTED*** 8)

You realize that when docking is finally released I will now **have** to build a huge mothership capable of dropping dozens of these from orbit.

**Bastard.**

> 
> Well, my brain is now all over the room. Excellent work.

Mine too ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

What happens when you fold it in-flight ? 8)

I will ry to do this !
basically it drops like a rock that you can steer a bit. i posted all the craft files in a diferent thread.
OMG, it maybe a key to a shape shifted wings. And shape shifted wings are key to everything ... ??? :-[
I just tried and miserably failed... well played, sir.

I\'m impressed! As said, this would be great for dropship-like ships, making it very easy for landing on other planets with atmosphere. I\'m finally getting some serious time to remake all of my orbital battlecruisers, but I think today I will specialize in ones that carry something like this. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I would like this in real life. But it would need VTOL.

'You will fly high over the traffic jams, with the new FoldCar, from SasquatchM industries !' ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
question how do you make all the parts so accurate from side to side if you cant use the mirror ?

Very, very carefully. I usually pick a reference point to work from and position them that way. The large hinges you can use mirror symmetry, but then have to use the rotate function in the DamnedRobotics GUI to realign the part that is bending the wrong way.
oh cool thank you very much you have some amazing planes keep up the awesome designs
I... Must.... HAVE!!! Could you post the .craft along with the .cfg edits? I can\'t live without the awesomeness of this plane!!!
there is a link in my sig to all my stuff.
